Mutate doubted he was going to die after what the
heros had said "your destiny is not yet fulfilled",
but he knew if he did die telling Rampage this would
only make things worse.

Mutate: I can hold on for now. Both the old bases are
gone. Do you know where we can get help?

He passed out (still breathing).

--- robertdahl <rdahl@...> wrote:
> Rampage finally made it far enough from the
> battlefield, where he
> figured he was safe. He rolled up behind a large
> rock formation, then
> transformed, trying as best he could to put Mutate
> down. He then
> clutched Mutates remaining hand.
> 
> "No, not again. You can't leave me again, not now."
> He said through
> rugged breaths. He looked the Mutate over. "In
> hundreds of vorns, your
> the only one to ever understand my pain." he said,
> clutching at his
> breast where his twisted spark resided. "Do not die
> on me," he begged.
> "fo The miserable like I have no other medicine But
> only hope."
>
